dialogueLines.line: What a pleasant surprise to see you drop in here unnoticed.
dialogueLines.speaker: h

dialogueLines.line: You may refer to me as H^DR4.
dialogueLines.speaker: h

dialogueLines.line: You know, a certain prismlike someone has told me a fair amount about you.
dialogueLines.speaker: h

dialogueLines.line: Most interestingly, about your singing talent.
dialogueLines.speaker: h

dialogueLines.line: Since you're already here, why not have a round with me?
dialogueLines.speaker: h

dialogueLines.line: And to make things a bit more interesting...
dialogueLines.speaker: h

dialogueLines.line: Let's have this little device here join the fray.
dialogueLines.speaker: h

dialogueLines.line: You recognize what this is right?
dialogueLines.speaker: h

dialogueLines.line: Be sure to keep your eye on it at all times.
dialogueLines.speaker: h
